name: Green Glow
description: A crisp blend of green apple, kale, cucumber, lemon, and mint. Packed with antioxidants and vitamins to give your body the fresh start it deserves.
howToUse: Shake well before drinking. Best enjoyed chilled in the morning or after a workout.

name: Berry Blast
description: A powerhouse of strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries blended into a tangy-sweet juice full of antioxidants.
howToUse: Best consumed mid-day as a snack replacement. Shake well.
benefits: High in antioxidants for cell protection

name: Citrus Recharge
description: A zesty fusion of orange, ginger, and lemon that awakens your senses and energizes your body.
howToUse: Drink anytime you need a refreshing pick-me-up. Shake before use.

name: Tropical Breeze
description: A refreshing tropical blend of pineapple, coconut water, and mango that feels like a beach vacation in a bottle.
howToUse: Drink chilled during hot days or post-exercise for hydration.

name: Detox Delight
description: A cleansing blend of celery, lemon, and parsley designed to flush toxins and restore balance.
howToUse: Drink in the morning on an empty stomach for best detox results.

name: Golden Vitality
description: A golden blend of carrot, turmeric, ginger, and apple that strengthens immunity and reduces inflammation.
howToUse: Consume once daily with meals for maximum absorption.
